text: The terms "proof of financial responsibility for the future" or "proof" or "proof of financial responsibility" as used in this chapter shall mean: Proof that the motor vehicle subject to registration or reciprocity under the laws of the District of Columbia is an insured motor vehicle under the provisions of the Compulsory/No-Fault Motor Vehicle Insurance Act of 1982.
historical:
Prior Codifications

1981 Ed., § 40-435.

1973 Ed., § 40-451.

Legislative History of Laws

For legislative history of D.C. Law 4-155, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 50-1301.03.

References in Text

The "Compulsory/No-Fault Motor Vehicle Insurance Act of 1982", referred to at the end of the section, is D.C. Law 4-155.

DC CODE § 50-1301.35

Current through December 11, 2012

title.text: Motor and Non-Motor Vehicles and Traffic. (Refs & Annos)

chapter.text: Motor Vehicle Owners and Operators Responsibility.

heading.catch_text: "Proof of financial responsibility for the future", "proof", or "proof of financial responsibility" defined.
